Core:PCProperties.Core:Property: "Search the Merry library database for entries matching one or several keywords. Note that this is not the same database +MHelp is using, as +MHelp is for internal Merry commands and +MSearch is for Merry libraries written IN Merry."
"+msearch wrap\\r\\n Search for any Merry scripts which contain the keyword 'wrap'\\r\\n\\r\\n+msearch updatedb\\r\\n Update the MSearch database."
